properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Yesu asante sana. x2
Kujifanya chakula. x2
Kujifanya chakula kutuletea
shibe alama ya pendo. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wewe ndiwe chetu chakula
cha uzima. Umetushibisha
Yesu asante.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kila tunapokula mkate huu
tunapata uzima wa milele.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Kila tunapokunywa
kikombe hiki
tunapata uzima wa milele.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Twashukuru ee Yesu
kwa wema wako
Umetushibisha Yesu asante.
